posts.text: Er einhver sem á svona stykki og til í að lána í kvöld

Dolly The Sexy Inflatable Sheep PP3076


'Meet dolly, the sexy inflatable sheep. Genetically modified for your pleasure, ewe'll never want another partner! Never again be alone at night, she's the plastic pal who's fun to be with. No more suspicious baas from the bedroom!'
